pages.text: Arifu ramu ra. Kore wa Keisuke no shirushi de, mago kata nai kuruan no shirushidearu
Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, jibun-tachi ga musurimudeattanaraba to, nozomu toki ga 屢 々 Arou
Kare-ra o honin shi, tabe sase tanoshima sete,(hakanai) kibo ni madowa sete okuga i. Mamonaku kare-ra wa satorudearou
Ware wa don'na machi o horobosu baai demo, sadame rareta kigen ga yattekita toki ni soshita
Dare mo sono jiki o hayame, mata okurasu koto wa dekinai
Kare-ra wa iu. `Kunkai ga keiji sa reta mono yo, hontoni anata wa tsuka reta monodearu
Moshi anata (no iu koto) ga shinjitsudearunaraba, naze tenshi o tsurete konai no ka
Ware wa, sorenari no riyu ni yoru igai ni wa tenshi o tsukawasanai. So nareba, kare-ra wa yuyo sa renai nodearu
Hontoni ware koso wa, sono kunkai o kudashi, kanarazu sore o shugo suru nodearu
Ware wa anata izen no, mukashi no sho shudan ni mo tashikani (shito-tachi o) noko wa shita
Daga shito-tachi ga kare-ra no moto ni kuru tabi ni, kare-ra ni yotte chosho sa renai mono wa nakatta
Kono yo ni ware wa, tsumibukaimono no kokoro ni,-so suru koto o shinobikoma seta
Mukashi no mono-tachi e no senrei ga atta no ni, kare-ra wa kono (keiji) o shinjinai
Tatoe ware ga kare-ra no tame ni ten no mon o aite,(zuiji) kare-ra o nobora seyou to shite mo
Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`watashi-tachi no me wa hontoni kurande shimatta. Iya watashi-tachi wa mahonikakerarete iru.' To iudearou
